Meteor.System.Asset

Class Asset

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.System.Asset.Asset
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Audio, Font, Image

    public abstract class Asset
extends java.lang.Object

    An abstract representation of a resource. An abstract asset used for deferred resource loading. Each resource is given a unique resource key (to identify the resource in the registrar) and an object reference to the actual resource.

      • Asset

        public Asset(java.lang.String type,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String filePath)
        Creates a deferrable asset.
        Parameters:
        type - Asset type prefix (to avoid ID clash).
        name - Unique identifier name.
        filePath - Resource path.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public abstract void load()
        This method will be implemented by concrete classes to load the actual asset.

      • getData

        public abstract java.lang.Object getData()
        Returns:
        The specific asset object.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Method used to clean up memory used by certain processes

      • crop

        public static java.lang.String crop(java.lang.String cropType,
                                    java.lang.String filePath)
        Method used to grab sub-sections of the 'filePath' string, such as 'fileName' and 'fileExtension'.
        Note: if no 'cropType' is specified, this method will return the 'filePath'.
        Parameters:
        cropType - The section to crop (e.g. 'fileName').
        filePath - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        The sub-section of the 'filePath' string, such as 'fileName' and 'fileExtension'.

      • cropFileName

        public static java.lang.String cropFileName(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method used to grab either the file-name along with its extension (e.g. fileName.png).
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        the file-name with the extension (e.g. fileName.png).

      • cropFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String cropFileExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method used to crop the file-type from the file-path. NOTE: Doesn't work with .tar.gz and others like it.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        The file-type.

        public boolean isLoaded()
